item.title: Peggy Lee - JOHNNY GUITAR
item.description:
Play the guitar
play it again
My Johnny
maybe you’re cold
But you’re
so warm inside
I was always a fool
for my Johnny
For the one they call
Johnny Guitar
Play it again
Johnny Guitar
Whether you go
whether you stay
I love you
what if you’re cruel
You can be kind
I know
There was never a man
like my Johnny
Like the one they call
Johnny Guitar-

There was never a man
like my Johnny
Like the one they call
Johnny Guitar
Play it again
Johnny Guitar-
